directions: Pour the Grand Marnier(R), triple sec, vodka, and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker over ice. Cover, and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Strain into a chilled martini glass, and garnish with a lime twist to serve.
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce Grand Marnier® or other orange-flavored brandy liqueur
title: Cosmopolitan with Grand Marnier®
